programme.title: 17 Miracles

programme.desc: An old fighter comes to town eager to fight Matt and a pianist arrives with more on his mind than a recital.

programme.desc: A drought torments Paterson's Ridge and a drifter arrives offering to help Kathleen find an underground well.
